thread.section_title: Premier Inn London Hanger Lane Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent
thread.title_full: Excellent - Review of Premier Inn London Hanger Lane Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: kald26
title: Excellent
text:
Stayed for one night
We had an event at Kennington olympia and was easier to get to on the central line. Staff were friendly and helpful. Our room was hugh clean and tidy. We were facing the main road but noise was minimal.
We had the meal deal. Â£23 for 2 course dinner plus a drink and unlimited breakfast. Food was great couldn't fault it.
Will definitely be staying here again.
